name.ja: フルスピード・ウォリアー

text.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Junk Synchron" or 1 Spell/Trap that mentions "Junk Warrior" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Fullspeed Warrior" once per turn. Monsters you control that mention "Junk Warrior", and Synchro Monsters you control with "Warrior" in their original names, gain 900 ATK during your Battle Phase only.
